content: pocket bunny by erica townsend owner of gracie s petals & bows measures 5 5 tall materials hook 3 5mm darning needle worsted weight size 4 medium yarn i used the red heart super saver yarn- aran and white embroidery floss- black and light pink the type of floss you would use for cross stitching stuffing safety eyes 8mm scissors wire brush blush makeup optional terms chain chain st stitch repeat * slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet two stitches together as one stitch to decrease gauge 9 single_crochet x 11 row = 2 x 2 gauge doesn t matter though as long as you are using a hook that is small enough you won t see the stuffing through the holes instructions head and body start with the aran colour of yarn and 3 5mm hook work in continuous rounds round 1 chain 2 work 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 8 single_crochet round 2 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts * repeat from * to * 10 single_crochet round 3 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 15 single_crochet hide your beginning tail now round 4 single_crochet in every st around 15 single_crochet round 5 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts * repeat from * to * around 20 single_crochet round 6 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts * repeat from * to * around 25 single_crochet rounds 7-9 single_crochet in every st around 25 single_crochet round 10 2 single_crochet in next 4 sts decrease 8 times 2 single_crochet in next 4 sts single_crochet in last st 25 single_crochet insert safety eyes on the top-side of the head where you did the decreased sts between rounds 5 and 6 with 5 sts showing in-between i like to indent my eyes a little you can do this in two different ways either sew a bit of yarn on the inside beside the eyes on both sides and tie them how tight you want it to be indented or you can wait till after you make your head and take a piece of yarn and sew through the head on either sides of the eyes and pull it in a bit that way as you sew back and forth through the head from eye to eye take your black and pink embroidery floss and stitch on a nose and mouth round 11 single_crochet in every st around 25 single_crochet round 12 2 single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in next 8 sts decrease single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 8 sts 2 single_crochet in last 2 sts 27 single_crochet round 13 single_crochet in every st around 27 single_crochet round 14 single_crochet in next 13 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 13 sts 28 single_crochet start stuffing the head rounds 15-18 single_crochet in every st around 28 single_crochet round 19 decrease single_crochet in next 11 sts
